translation.Japanese: この言葉は「加える」という日本語です。
translation.English: The given Japanese word is "加える," which means "to add."
translation.Persian: کلمه ژاپنی ارائه شده "加える" است که به معنای "اضافه کردن" می باشد.
translation.Nepali: दिइएको जापानी शब्द "加える" हो, जसको अर्थ "थप्नु" हुन्छ।
translation.Indonesian: Kata Jepang yang diberikan adalah "加える", yang berarti "menambahkan".
translation.Filipino: Ang salitang Hapon na ibinigay ay "加える," na nangangahulugang "magdagdag."
translation.Vietnamese: Từ tiếng Nhật được đưa ra là "加える", có nghĩa là "thêm vào."
translation.Burmese: ပေးထားသော ဂျပန်စကားလုံးမှာ "加える" ဖြစ်ပြီး "ထည့်သွင်းသည်" ဟု အဓိပ္ပါယ်ရသည်။
translation.Hindi: दिया गया जापानी शब्द "加える" है, जिसका अर्थ है "जोड़ना।"
translation.Arabic: الكلمة اليابانية المقدمة هي "加える" والتي تعني "إضافة".
translation.French: Le mot japonais donné est "加える", qui signifie "ajouter".
translation.Spanish: La palabra japonesa dada es "加える", que significa "añadir".
translation.Chinese: 给出的日语词是“加える”，意思是“添加”。
translation.Bengali: প্রদত্ত জাপানি শব্দটি হচ্ছে "加える", যার অর্থ "যোগ করা"।

translation.English: 加える : to add; to append; to increase
translation.Persian: افزودن : to add; کنترل کردن; افزایش دادن
translation.Nepali: थप्नु : to add; थप गर्न; बृद्धि गर्नु
translation.Vietnamese: thêm : to add; tăng cường; nâng cao
translation.Burmese: လေးသော: to add; တိုးရန်; တိုးတက်စေချင်; အသိပေး
translation.Hindi: जोड़ना : to add; सम्मिलित करना; बढ़ाना
translation.Chinese: 添加 : to add; 增加
translation.Bengali: যোগ করা : to add; বৃদ্ধি করা

meanings.part_of_speech: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means to add or increase something. In the word かそく it gives the idea of adding speed, so the meaning becomes speeding up. In the word ついか it carries the sense of adding something extra or appending it to what already exists.

explanations.explanation: The word くわえる means to add or to append something, often referring to including additional items or quantities. It can also imply the action of joining something into a group.
explanations.youtube_description:
Learn how to use the Japanese word 加える (くわえる) in everyday conversations!  
In this video, we'll explore its meanings, kanji breakdowns, and collocations to help you master this essential vocabulary.
Whether you're a beginner or looking to expand your Japanese skills, this video is perfect for you. Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more language learning content!
explanations.motivation: The word we'll be learning in this section is くわえる which you will often hear in situations where adding or including something is discussed, such as cooking, group activities, or conversations about joining.
explanations.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the word くわえる is ふやす. While くわえる often implies adding in a more static or one-time manner, ふやす emphasizes the action of increasing or multiplying, often used for quantities or improving numbers.
explanations.antonyms_explanation: The word くわえる has no direct antonyms, as it specifically revolves around the action of adding or including.

examples.kanji: コーヒーに砂糖を加える。
examples.furigana: コーヒーに砂糖(さとう)を加(くわ)える。

translation.Japanese: コーヒーに砂糖を加える。
translation.Persian: شکر را به قهوه اضافه کنید.

examples.kanji: 私は会議に新しいアイデアを加えます。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は会議(かいぎ)に新(あたら)しいアイデアを加(くわ)えます。

translation.Japanese: 私は会議に新しいアイデアを加えます。
translation.English: I add new ideas to the meeting.
translation.Persian: من ایده‌های جدیدی به جلسه اضافه می‌کنم.
translation.Indonesian: Saya menambahkan ide baru ke dalam rapat.
translation.Filipino: Nagdagdag ako ng mga bagong ideya sa pulong.
translation.Vietnamese: Tôi thêm ý tưởng mới vào cuộc họp.
translation.Burmese: ငါက အစည်းအဝေးမှာ အဖွဲ့သစ်တွေ ထည့်ပြောတော့မယ်။
translation.Hindi: मैं बैठक में नए विचार जोड़ता हूँ।
translation.French: J'ajoute de nouvelles idées à la réunion.
translation.Spanish: Agrego nuevas ideas a la reunión.
translation.Chinese: 我在会议上添加新的想法。
translation.Bengali: আমি মিটিংয়ে নতুন আইডিয়া যোগ করি।

examples.furigana: 塩(しお)を料理(りょうり)に加(くわ)えます。

examples.kanji: 新しいメンバーを加える。
examples.furigana: 新(あたら)しいメンバーを加(くわ)える。

translation.Japanese: 新しいメンバーを加える。
translation.Burmese: အသစ်သောအဖွဲ့ဝင်ကိုထည့်ပါ။

examples.kanji: 彼は新しいアイデアを評価に加えた。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は新(あたら)しいアイデアを評価(ひょうか)に加(くわ)えた。

translation.Japanese: 彼は新しいアイデアを評価に加えた。
translation.English: He added a new idea to the evaluation.
translation.Persian: او یک ایده جدید به ارزیابی اضافه کرد.
translation.Indonesian: Dia menambahkan ide baru ke penilaian.
translation.Filipino: Nagdagdag siya ng bagong ideya sa pagsusuri.
translation.Vietnamese: Anh ấy đã thêm một ý tưởng mới vào đánh giá.
translation.Burmese: သူက အဆင့်သတ်မှတ်မှုမှာ အမှတ်အသစ်ထည့်ပြောလိုက်တယ်။
translation.Hindi: उन्होंने मूल्यांकन में एक नया विचार जोड़ा।
translation.Arabic: أضاف هو فكرة جديدة إلى التقييم.
translation.French: Il a ajouté une nouvelle idée à l'évaluation.
translation.Spanish: Él agregó una nueva idea a la evaluación.
translation.Chinese: 他在评估中加入了一个新想法。
translation.Bengali: তিনি মূল্যায়নে একটি নতুন ধারণা যোগ করেছেন।

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
